brief_title: HIV/STD Safer Sex Skills Groups for Men in Drug Treatment Programs - 1
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate a five-session Human Immunodeficiency Virus/Acquired Immune Deficiency Disease (HIV/AIDS) group therapy designed specifically for heterosexual men. This therapy is compared to standard HIV/AIDS education, which generally consists of a single session of HIV education.
criteria: All adult males age 18 and above in drug abuse treatment at participating Community Treatment Providers will be invited to participate.
